metadata.title: CVE-2023-35924 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 10.0.0 and prior to version 10.0.8, GLPI inventory endpoint can beused to drive a SQL injection attack. By default, GLPI inventory endpointrequires no authentication. Version 10.0.8 has a patch for this issue. As aworkaround, one may disable native inventory.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
